title: can you help me to check RMA number and information of of imei 358034080362178 ?
content:
i'm 2nd user of the pixel 2xl, as checking on webside i found the warraty still 14th Mar 2020 but the manufacturer date is 27th September 2017. it was a referbished phone.

so i want to check the status of my phone? is it returned after hardware issue before and the date of first active my phone.

many thanks
Tai
